backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with authorization, data types, and state for students, courses, announcements, attendance, enrollments, and results, plus admin‑gated course management functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of the Caffeine branding footer and listing affected files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH tokens for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for deploying the frontend to IC mainnet, including prerequisites and build steps.
frontend/README.md: Frontend overview covering features, tech stack, setup, authentication flow, and deployment checklist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app file defining routing, authentication guards, layouts, and dashboard routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminStude: Admin dialog for viewing and toggling a student’s attendance using a calendar with month navigation and status updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/Announceme: Modal form for creating or editing announcements with title, message, and date fields using mutation hooks.
Displays a list of announcements with edit and delete actions, opening AnnouncementEditor for modifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/CourseEdit: Dialog form for creating or updating courses, including title, description, instructor, schedule, and fee fields.
frontend/src/components/admin/CourseList: Renders a grid of courses with details and provides edit and delete controls via CourseEditor and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/Enrollment: Admin panel to view and manage enrollments by student or course, including approving, rejecting, and renewing requests.
frontend/src/components/admin/ResultsPan: Interface for selecting students and courses and submitting test or daily results, along with viewing existing results.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteSettin: Admin panel for editing site contact details and uploading a logo with validation and preview.
frontend/src/components/admin/StudentEdi: Dialog for editing a student's profile, validating form fields, and optionally uploading a new photo.
frontend/src/components/admin/StudentLis: Displays a table of student profiles with options to edit profiles or manage attendance.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Atten: Reusable calendar component showing daily attendance states with navigation and optional interactivity.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Stude: Student view that loads caller attendance data and displays it in a read‑only attendance calendar.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppContai: Layout wrapper providing consistent page padding and centered content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header bar showing logo, role badge, navigation links, and account menu with logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Form modal for creating a student profile, including validation, photo upload, preview, and submission via createStudentProfile.
frontend/src/components/student/Enrollme: Displays courses with enrollment status and allows students to request enrollment or renewal.
frontend/src/components/student/ResultsP: Fetches and displays a student's test and daily results with course names and formatted dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useByteImageObjectUrl: Converts image bytes into an object URL for display and cleans up the URL on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context including login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogoObjectUrl.ts: Creates an object URL from logo bytes for rendering and revokes it on cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating student profiles, roles, courses, announcements, and admin-managed data via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark OKLCH color tokens, layout utilities, and component surface classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: UI page that prompts unauthenticated users to sign in or return home when access is restricted.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard showing stats and tabbed management interfaces for courses, announcements, students, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDiagnostics.tsx: Diagnostics page showing admin status, data connectivity checks, version info, and environment details.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page displaying hero content, course and announcement data, contact info, and sign‑in routing.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Dashboard page fetching student profile, courses, and announcements and rendering profile details with panels for attendance, enrollment, and results.
frontend/src/utils/attendanceDates.ts: Utility functions for working with attendance dates, including month navigation, time conversion, and lookup creation.
frontend/src/utils/fileToUint8Array.ts: Converts a File object into a Uint8Array using FileReader for backend storage.
frontend/src/utils/icEnv.ts: Utilities for determining environment settings, production checks, and resolving asset paths on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/version.ts: Defines app version metadata and provides functions to retrieve version and build info.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, issues, and current development state for the JK Tuition Center app.
